cause.description:
This group seeks to educate the masses about the dangers Raptors pose to humanity.
Everything anyone needs to know about Raptor defense is explained in "The Guide to Raptor Violence Prevention & Defense", made available cost-free through the combined efforts of the International Raptor Defense Alliance and the United Raptor Widows Fund.
Download it here: http://www.sendspace.com/file/48cwt6
Join the IRDA on Facebook here for IRDA updates: http://ut.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2356579166
then help spread awareness by purchasing merchandise here:
http://www.cafepress.com/irdastore
Also in the interest of spreading awareness, please invite your friends, nay, everyone you know, friend or enemy. We are all united in the fight against the Raptor menace.
1. Raptors are the second-leading cause of death worldwide- this must end.
2. The public must be educated about the dangers Raptors pose to all of humanity.
3. All people, regardless of gender, ethnicity, religous affiliation, or geographic location is at a serious risk of Raptor attack.
cause.mission: To educate the masses about the dangers Raptors pose to humanity.
cause.name: International Raptor Defense Alliance
